text:
Eric Alexander Wareheim (; born April 7, 1976) is an American actor, comedian, writer, director, and musician. He is one half of the comedy duo Tim & Eric, alongside Tim Heidecker. They created the television shows "Tom Goes to the Mayor", "Tim and Eric Awesome Show, Great Job!", "Check It Out! with Dr. Steve Brule", "Tim and Eric's Bedtime Stories", and "Beef House".
He had a constant role on the Netflix series "Master of None".
Wareheim was born in Audubon, Pennsylvania.

annotations.surface_form: Tim and Eric Awesome Show, Great Job!
Check It Out! with Dr. Steve Brule
